cab.content: (P 541)3) From Secretary of Slate to Viceroy, Foreign Department,' liHli September \Secret. Your telegram 1308 of 6th September. Afghanistan. 1 do not see that any purpose is gained byxlilating on outrageous abuse of Afghan post office if you at once proceed in effect to condone it. ' As at present, advised I cannot agree to its re-opening in any form and I note that Roos-Keppel wished to have it closed seven years ago, see his letter No. 142G of 18th September, 191.2.
